scripts.deploy: aws s3 cp build/tt.js.gz s3://tiny-tag/tt.js --content-encoding gzip --content-type application/javascript && aws s3 cp build/tt-rudder-compat.js.gz s3://tinytag/tt-rudder-compat.js --content-encoding gzip --content-type application/javascript
scripts.release: npm run build && gzip -9 -c build/tt.js > build/tt.js.gz && gzip -9 -c build/tt-rudder-compat.js > build/tt-rudder-compat.js.gz && npm run deploy
